ItemTooltips.blink: A Force Staff/ Blink Dagger will give you a means to jump to the enemy to initiate and throw your ult, or be used as an escape mechanic.
ItemTooltips.magic_stick: Stores charges with every spell the enemy casts. Use it to consume the charges and restore a portion of your health and mana.
ItemTooltips.clarity: Use on self to get temporary increased mana regeneration!
ItemTooltips.flask: Your emergency healing item, pop it go a huge burst of health regen, don't get hit while the regen is in effect!
ItemTooltips.ward_observer: You will need Observation Wards for maintaining map vision.
ItemTooltips.ward_sentry: Sentry Wards for dewarding the enemy observer wards.
ItemTooltips.tango: Use this on a tree to get temporary increased health regeneration!
ItemTooltips.power_treads: An item which can be switched between different attribute modes, giving a bonus to a select attribute. Keep it in Strength mode (Red), as it will help you survive longer.
ItemTooltips.mekansm: This item gives good health regen, and a healing burst along with armour. It is needed to help your team survive teamfights as it provides heals in an area, making it your number one support item.
ItemTooltips.sheepstick: Very expensive for a support, consider this if you have extra gold to spare. Provides good utility in the form of a hex.
ItemTooltips.orchid: Very expensive for a support, consider this if you have extra gold to spare. Provides good utility in the form of silence.
ItemTooltips.cyclone: Eul's Scepter of Divinity gives you an activatable cyclone which propels a target up to the air, granting it 2 seconds of invulnerability, while making it unable to move or use anything. It gives good movement speed, mana regen, and the cyclone can be used to save yourself.
ItemTooltips.force_staff: A Force Staff/ Blink Dagger will give you a means to jump to the enemy to initiate and throw your ult, or be used as an escape mechanic.
ItemTooltips.arcane_boots: Go Arcane boots if your team requires alot of mana usage. This item has an activatable ability which grants the user and all nearby allies a burst of mana. The mana provided will help your sustainability in the game and give your teammates much needed mana when required.
